title: 3V3 RANKED TWISTED TREELINE
body: WHEN WILL IT BE AVAILABLE ITS ALL I AND MY FRIENDS WANT TO DO...

replies.body: reguardless of how many people play TT it show be able to be played, if NA can have it so should we, Most my friends have gone back to NA server just to play Ranked TT. If TT comes out most people willl play!

I understand the frustration, I would jump into some Ranked TT if I could. 

Unfortunately there are no plans to open Ranked Twisted Treeline up anytime soon.

We do evaluate it at every meeting, as we do for all of our queues. It's just about what the numbers make sense to do.

If we grow to the point of being able to open it, then it will be posted here on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZoOOIpc2,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-10-19T23:09:52.447+0000)

>** If we grow to the point of being able to open it**, then it will be posted here on the boards.

Hi Sephyre,

Sorry to be a pain. Would you say we are not realistically far off that magic number required or are we a long way off?

Yeh of course the population of OCE will magically increase 

Mind you 3v3 ranked existed on EUW since two years ago. Doesn't happen on OCE but how :/

> [{quoted}](name=Your Neighbour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZoOOIpc2,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-10-20T13:45:42.327+0000)
>
> Yeh of course the population of OCE will magically increase 
> 
> Mind you 3v3 ranked existed on EUW since two years ago. Doesn't happen on OCE but how :/

I believe! lol
PLEASE RITO, MAKE RANKED TT MORE OF A THING

Think this would be the best i see the same people that play 3v3 every thursday to saturday and we all remember each other, Wish we can just play competitively mean while doing the weird things like Bard jungle or showing our "Skills" with Darius
